status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5to05","text":"Rats are euthanized as per IACUC guidelines","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7can2","text":"Spray fur with ethanol. Pick up skin above the sternum, and make a cut through skin and muscle layers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdaan","text":"Don’t cut the chest cavity (don’t go above the diaphragm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75blk","text":" Cut skin and muscles from the sternum down to the lower belly. Mostly you will see liver and colon. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b40gt","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bcuvj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4B0FFFE0B9BD11EC95A2C90E3DB3A8B6","height":206,"id":230199,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screen Shot 2022-04-11 at 10.31.45 AM.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ha33bqymf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ha3zbqymf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ha32bqymf.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ha3ybqymf.webp","width":219}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62s0d","text":"Lift liver lobes and push aside fat tissue and intestines. You will see dark-colored organs – kidney and spleen. {"blocks":[{"key":"f8ag3","text":"Count the number of observed kidneys and make a record in the file. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
